sourcesContent:
Angular HTTP Basics

{{ post | json }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'jira-web'; posts: any; readonly ROOT_URL = 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' readonly APP_URL = 'http://localhost:8080' constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} getPosts() { this.posts = this.http.get(this.APP_URL + '/posts'); } }
